    üß∞ The Real Essentials

    These are the things we reach for every trip ‚Äî the kit that earns its keep.

    • Levelling ramps ‚Äì Because sleeping on a slope is no fun.
    • 25m electric hookup cable ‚Äì With a waterproof bag to keep it tidy.
    • Fresh water hose ‚Äì Food-grade, with a variety of tap connectors.
    • Toilet chemicals ‚Äì Trust us, don‚Äôt skip this.
    • Wheel chocks ‚Äì Especially on sloped pitches.
    • Gas bottle spanner ‚Äì You‚Äôll thank yourself at 7pm in the rain.
    • Torch or headlamp ‚Äì For late-night loo runs or fuse checks.
    • First aid kit ‚Äì Obvious, but often forgotten.

    üßº Comfort & Cleanliness

    • Microfibre cloths ‚Äì For everything from condensation to dishes.
    • Collapsible washing-up bowl ‚Äì Saves space, works everywhere.
    • Hooks & suction cups ‚Äì For towels, coats, fairy lights‚Ä¶
    • Doormat ‚Äì Keeps the inside cleaner, longer.
    • Laundry bag ‚Äì Keep the pong contained.

    üç≥ Kitchen Must-Haves

    • Stackable pans ‚Äì Space-saving and versatile.
    • Thermal mugs ‚Äì For hot drinks on the move.
    • Reusable water bottles ‚Äì Stay hydrated, save plastic.
    • Condiment caddy ‚Äì Salt, pepper, oil, and emergency chocolate.
    • Lighter or matches ‚Äì For gas hobs and BBQs.

    ‚ö° Power & Tech

    • Leisure battery ‚Äì A decent one makes all the difference.
    • USB charging hub ‚Äì For phones, tablets, and fairy lights.
    • 12V inverter ‚Äì For occasional 230V use (laptops, cameras).
    • Solar panel (portable or fixed) ‚Äì Optional, but brilliant for off-grid.

    üõ†Ô∏è Tools & Spares

    • Basic toolkit ‚Äì Screwdrivers, pliers, duct tape, cable ties.
    • Fuses & bulbs ‚Äì For quick fixes on the road.
    • Tyre pressure gauge ‚Äì Especially if you‚Äôre carrying bikes or gear.
    • Spare toilet cassette ‚Äì If you‚Äôve got the space, it‚Äôs a game-changer.

    üòé Nice-to-Haves (But Worth It)

    • Outdoor mat ‚Äì Keeps dirt out and makes a great sitting area.
    • Fairy lights or lanterns ‚Äì Instant atmosphere.
    • Folding chairs & table ‚Äì For al fresco everything.
    • Thermal blinds ‚Äì Keeps heat in (or out), adds privacy.
    • Bluetooth speaker ‚Äì For tunes at the pitch.
